name: Intern-ope
description:
Intern-ope is an exploration into narrative design and interactive fiction. In this game, the player will take on the role of a new intern at a small indie studio. Through the exploration of the office and interaction with the employees, the player will get a feel for some of the interpersonal relationships that exist in the space.

For this project I wanted to use visual storytelling techniques, along with short interactions, to provide characters with depth, personality, and substance. I want the player to explore the area visually, to get a feel for each character. There are plenty of playful little moments built in to the environment, including flavor text.

Along the way, the player will also get a sense of what it's like to work in a small indie studio, where each person has to take on multiple roles and use a variety of skill sets to create a game.
